price.price1: Our service is at a single rate of

subscription_screen.sorry_message: Pass or Subscription currently not available in your city, we will inform you as soon as we add it to your city
subscription_screen.error_message: Your payment was not completed, check your payment method and try again.
subscription_screen.success_message: Your purchase is confirmed. You can use your 2-trip pass until
subscription_screen.info: We can withhold a small amount when you start a journey
subscription_screen.loading_history_purchase: Your purchase history is being processed ....
subscription_screen.confirm: I confirm that the finalization of the payment will immediately activate this pass
subscription_screen.no_trips: You have used all your trips this month

notification-screen.no_notification: You have no notification for the moment

check_current_trip.title: Checking existing trip
check_current_trip.description: We verify if you have already an ongoing trip.

check_unpaid_trip.title: Checking unpaid trip
check_unpaid_trip.description: We verify you have no unpaid trip.

check_current_bike.title: Checking bike
check_current_bike.description: Verifying if bike is available and not booked.

checking_deposit.title: Checking your deposit
checking_deposit.description: Before the start of any trip, a temporary deposit of 50€ is required. We need to authenticate your means of payment for security reasons.

creating_trip.title: Creating a new trip...
creating_trip.description: We are recording your trip for invoice generation.

lock_connecting.title: Opening the lock in progress
lock_connecting.description: Please wait a few moments, the lock of your Bik'air electric bike is being unlocked.

lock_open.title: Lock opened!
lock_open.description: Your Bik'air electric bike is unlocked, enjoy your ride in peace!

lock_closing.title: Please close the lock
lock_closing.description: You can now close the lock manually using the left latch.

lock_close.title: Lock closed!
lock_close.description: Your Bik'air electric bike is locked!

lock_timeout.title: Timeout locking your bike
lock_timeout.description: Please restart your Bluetooth then retry.

unlock_timeout.title: Timeout unlocking your bike
unlock_timeout.description: Please restart your Bluetooth.Your trip will be automaticaly cancel after 2 failed attempts.

lock_retry_closing.title: Oops you waited too long
lock_retry_closing.description: Click on the button below to retry closing your trip

trip_closing.title: End of your trip
trip_closing.description: Please wait a few moments, so that you can close the lock manually.

verify_lock_closed.title: Close your lock MANUALLY
verify_lock_closed.description: Please ensure you have closed the lock manually.

trip_paying.title: Payment of your current trip is being processed...

trip_paying_after.title: Payment of your last trip...
trip_paying_after.description: You need to pay for your last trip to start a new one!

trip_paid.title: Payment successed!
trip_paid.description: Your payment is done, see you soon for a new trip!

trip_finish_payment.title: Incomplete payment
trip_finish_payment.description: Your payment has not been completed, please click on finish

trip_payment_error.title: Payment error
trip_payment_error.description: Your payment method could not be validated. Please make sure you have the necessary funds or add another credit card in the Payment page of the application.

deposit_uncaptured.title: Your deposit cannot be captured
deposit_uncaptured.description: You need a deposit to start a trip. Please ensure to have enough funds or call your bank.

unlock_failed.title: Failed to open lock
unlock_failed.description: Please check your bluetooth connection. Restart it then try again.

begin_failed.title: Trip canceled
begin_failed.description: Something went wrong, please contact support as we can help you .

start_failed.title: Trip canceled
start_failed.description: Une erreur est survenue, veuillez contacter le support afin de résoudre ce problème dans les plus brefs delais.

trip_payment_hold.title: You are offline !
trip_payment_hold.description: We will try again when you get back online

error_connect.title: Oops, an error has occurred...
error_connect.description: We are sorry but an error occurred while connecting to the Bik'air electric bike.

tips.title: Welcome at Bik'Air
tips.text:
Freedom is yours! 
Create your account to use our self-service electric bikes without stations in your city!

auth.title: Verification
auth.instruction: Please enter the code you received via sms

phone_verify.title: Identification
phone_verify.error: Something went wrong, please try again.

support.descriptionPH: Describe the issue that you encountered
support.error: Please, fill all the fields to continue.
support.success: Your message has been sent. You will receive an answer by email.

trip_pause.title: Feel like making a stop?
trip_pause.line_1: Lock your lock without stopping your trip.
trip_pause.line_5: Please note that you will NOT be able to finish your journey outside the service's area of use (limited to cities with blue lines).
trip_pause.line_6: Remember to close your lock when you stop! And to open it to resume your trip!
trip_pause.new_line_1: Lock the Bik'air ebike without finishing your trip.
trip_pause.new_line_2: CAREFUL : your trip is still on going, you will continue to be charged for the time of the break.
trip_pause.new_line_3: BUT you will keep your Bik'air bike the time of your stop whether you are out of the zone or not (limit visible by the blue lines on the application).

bluetooth_error.title: Connection to lock failed.
bluetooth_error.line_1: Restart your bluetooth and try again.

permission_error.title: $t(permission_error.{{permission}}) permission not allowed.
permission_error.line_1: You have not granted permission to use $t(permission_error.{{permission}}).
permission_error.line_2: We need this permission in order to work properly.

start_trip.title: Scan the QR Code to unlock the bike
start_trip.already_on_trip: Your already have an open trip

parking_photo.title: Take a photo of your parked bike
parking_photo.title1: The photo should show the bike, the parking lot markings and the surroundings. Take a step back to get a good picture!
parking_photo.desc_photo: If you do not park properly, you risk a parking fine of € 10.00

end_trip.tips: You can lock your bike without ending your trip.

disclaimerPark.line_2: Your 50€ deposit will be AUTOMATICALLY retained if:
disclaimerPark.line_3: You park the Bik'air electric bike in a private place and inaccessible to others and to our teams
disclaimerPark.line_4: You park the Bik'air electric bike in an inappropriate place
disclaimerPark.line_5: You park the Bik'air electric bike in a place that hinders pedestrian and city traffic.

end_trip.disclaimerLock: Press the "lock" button below and then close the lock manually to lock the bike and stop invoicing.
end_trip.error_zone: You are not in the parking area. You need to park inside the blue line area to finish your trip.
end_trip.msg_close: You can now close your bike/lock

location.title: Grant access to your GPS
location.message: Bik'air needs to know your position to find available bikes around you.
location.error: We need your geolocation to access all the options of this application.

camera.title: Permission to access the camera
camera.message: The application requires access to your camera to take pictures and scan QR codes.

bluetooth.open: Active your bluetooth to start a trip
bluetooth.close: Active your bluetooth to end a trip
bluetooth.message: To unlock your bike and start a ride, remember to activate the Bluetooth on your phone. Remember to keep your bluetooth activated to finish your ride.
bluetooth.error: Connection to lock failed. Restart your bluetooth and try again.

location.title: Location inactive
location.message: Bik'air need your geolocation to use the service

network.online: You must be online to start a new trip

lock.trip_closed: If you want to complete your trip, validate the end of the trip by clicking on the blue button at the bottom to stop billing 🙂

message.beginning: This code give you access at

deposit.title: At the beginning of the trip a bank footprint on 7 days of 50€ is mandatory.
deposit.text: It is kept for 7 days so that it is not required for each new trip and will be returned automatically afterwards.
deposit.text2: If the Bik'air electric bike is
deposit.text5: in a privatized place and inaccessible for the customers and the Bik'air teams
deposit.text9: : the deposit of 50€ will be AUTOMATICALLY retained.

payment.title: Payment
payment.popup: Do you really want to delete your payment method?
payment.add_card: We need to save your card to use all our services.
payment.success: Your payment method is successfully set up for future payments!
payment.disable_delete: You cannot delete your card while on trip
payment.error_3Dsecure_deposit: You don't have sufficient fund to start a trip. A deposit of 50€ is mandatory. This deposit will be returned once the trip is finished and paid.
payment.error_3Dsecure_payment: There was a problem during payment process, we will try again later.

sponsor.subtitle: Give and receive a free ride
sponsor.paragraphe: Offer a 15-mins free ride to a friend by inviting him/her to discover Bik'air and win a 15-mins free ride on his/her first use.
sponsor.label: Share your sponsor code :

trips.noTrip: You don't have any trip yet !

account.checkbox_terms: I understand and agree with the General Conditions of Access and Use of the Bik'air service.
account.delete_account_info: Are you sure you want to delete your account ?
account.error: Thank you to fill all the fields
account.error_terms: Please accept the terms and conditions
account.error_age: You cannot use Bik'Air services, you are under 16!

slide1.title: Welcome to you Bik'er !
slide1.description: To use our electric bikes, it's very simple.

slide2.title: Without terminals
slide2.description: Use the lock on the back wheel with the mobile app

slide3.title: Service area
slide3.description: End your trip where you want within the limits of the area shown on the map

slide5.title: Let's go
slide5.description: Log in to book your bike

settings.notif_infos: Select the notifications that you want to receive.
settings.INFORMATIONS_INFOS: To receive all the information and news about Bik'air

error: Oops, unknown error, please try again or contact au 06 17 15 71 11
error_lock: Oops, check if your lock is closed before ending the trip or contact-us 06 17 15 71 11
payment_error: Your payment did not go through, please make sure you have the necessary funds or get closer to your bank.

update.title: An update is necessary!
update.line_1: Update your Bik'air application to get the latest features!
update.line_2: If you don't see update button in store, please reset cache and data from store application.

Network Error: A network error occured. Please check your data.
